defaultRecipes.name: Brownie In a Mug
defaultRecipes.description: A quick brownie made in a microwave,

directions.step: Snap the chocolate into a small bowl and spoon in the sugar and butter. Melt in a microwave for 45 seconds, then stir to continue the melting in the residual heat.
Crack in the egg and beat together, followed by the flour and cocoa.
Cook for 2 mins on full power (800 watts), then leave to rest for another 2 minutes.
Chop the nuts and add to the mixture.
Decorate with a dusting of icing sugar, a sprig of mint and a dollop of ice cream! Tuck in!

defaultRecipes.creator: SORTEDfood
